entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -23.1°C
entry.summary:

Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then periods of snow. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:36 PM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023
